CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_medias` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `mediatype` varchar(8) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `mediaurl` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `media_id` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_ifans_groupsend` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `from_user` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `msgtype` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `msg` varchar(800) NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `errorcode` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `starttime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `send_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
